extension.name: Publish Button
extension.description: A button that toggles an entry's published-state and allows authors to preview unpublished entries on the live site.

releases.release: - Bug fix where the checked state was being set on load and not being updated on click, resulting in the same state being sent via AJAX regardless of checked state.
- Added Links to the meta.xml - Unified version numbers in meta.xml - Extended readme
- Fix bug where authors and managers wouldn't see the button
- Make sure JS is executed after window load
